properties.name: isValid
properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

properties.name: parent
properties.description: The parent of the FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting (a FindChangeTransparencySetting, FindChangeStrokeTransparencySetting, FindChangeFillTransparencySetting or FindChangeContentTransparencySetting).

properties.name: applied
properties.description: If true, the directional feather effect is applied. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: leftWidth
properties.description: The feather width (in pixels) on the left side of the FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting. Can return: Unit (0 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: rightWidth
properties.description: The feather width (in pixels) on the right side of the FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting. (Range: .2 to 250). Can return: Unit (0 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: topWidth
properties.description: The feather width (in pixels) on the top side of the object FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting. (Range: .2 to 250). Can return: Unit (0 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: bottomWidth
properties.description: The feather width (in pixels) on the bottom side of the object FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting. (Range: .2 to 250). Can return: Unit (0 - 1000 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: chokeAmount
properties.description: The amount to choke the directional feather (as a percentage of the feather width). (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: angle
properties.description: The angle of the feather. (Range: 180 to -180). Can return: Real (-180 - 180) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: followShapeMode
properties.description: The shape-following algorithm applied to the feather. Can return: FollowShapeModeOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: noise
properties.description: The amount of noise (as a percentage) applied to the feather region. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.

properties.name: properties
properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FindChangeDirectionalFeatherSetting.

methods.name: getElements
methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
